LanguageData.ZP_RawWater.label: Natural Water
LanguageData.ZP_RawWater.description: Water gather from natural sources, it might be dangerous to just drink the water as may contain harmful substances or imputies.\n生の水。そのまま飲むと高確率で食中毒になります
LanguageData.ZP_Water.label: Boiled Water
LanguageData.ZP_DrinkingWater.label: Mineral water
LanguageData.ZP_DrinkingWater.description: 飲料水。飲むことで簡単な熱中症対策にもなる。
